eBay | https://www.ebay.com | San Jose | Software Engineer (backend) | Full time | Onsite

We are looking for 2 back-end software engineers(senior and above) to work in Risk product development team, which is responsible for managing seller and buyer risk in eBay marketplace. Our core product is a decisioning platform that handles ~ 200 M requests per day integrating with all major flows on eBay.

Technologies:

Backend: Java, Jersey based REST services, Spring batch based batch jobs, Event/Messaging systems

Tools: Git, Jenkins

Datastores: Oracle, Mongodb and Hadoop

Frontend: Angular JS/bootstrap

I'm a developer in this team. Shoot me an email at baathreya @ ebay . com
